summary: This document is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the FBI Victim Services Division organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in New York and Florida. The emails coordinate logistics, media concerns, and contact information for FBI personnel involved in the victim outreach effort.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FBI investigation; the briefings are for victims of his crimes.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Florida
events.description: A meeting organized by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available services, held in Florida.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York City
events.description: A meeting organized by the FBI Victim Services Division for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available services and address media concerns, held in New York City.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized separate briefings for Epstein victims in New York (Oct 23) and Florida (Oct 15) in October 2019.
The briefings aimed to inform victims about available services but would not provide specific details about the active investigation.
Attendance was limited to the victim and one support person, requiring an RSVP by October 4, 2019.
The email chain shows coordination between FBI personnel regarding media contacts and logistics for the events.
The document references an FBI case number and involvement from the FBI NY Field Office and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
